our_solution: Our Solution: Speed, Trust, and Transparency.
direct_application_desc: Citizens apply directly on our simple, easy-to-use platform. No agents needed.
ai_powered_verification_desc: Our AI instantly verifies documents like Aadhaar and land records, detecting fraud and duplicates.
immutable_blockchain_record_desc: Every step is permanently recorded on the blockchain. It cannot be changed, deleted, or hidden.
direct_benefit_transfer_desc: Once approved, funds are transferred directly to the citizen's bank account. Fast and secure.
click_to_upload: Click to upload or drag and drop
receive_updates_15_days: You will receive updates within 15 days on your registered mobile number and email.
save_tracking_id: Please save your tracking ID to monitor your application status. You can track your application anytime using the 'Track Application' feature.
choose_scheme: Choose the scheme you want to apply for:
hero_subheading: AI and Blockchain-powered platform ensuring transparent, corruption-free delivery of government welfare schemes to every deserving citizen across India.
hero_slide_awas_desc: New homes for deserving families across India
hero_slide_swachh_desc: Community participation in Clean India initiatives
hero_slide_drought_desc: Supporting farmers and communities during drought
hero_slide_justice_desc: Ensuring timely delivery of welfare benefits
track_enter_tracking_id_desc: Enter your 12-digit tracking ID to get real-time updates on your welfare scheme application
problem_section_heading: The System is Broken. We're Here to Fix It.
problem_middlemen_desc: Agents demand 20-40% commission, blocking genuine applicants.
problem_delays_desc: Families wait months with no updates, while applications are lost or manipulated.
problem_verification_desc: Manual verification is prone to bias, favoring relatives and bribe-givers.
